Articles.Content:
Hey all

After being a non-member lurker for a few weeks i just wanted to make an account to say thanks to all those people who take the time to answer the questions posted. Some of you are absolute monsters of knowledge which has been so so helpful in getting me to understand this game. 

Again thank you so much, without these forums i defiantly would have rage quit by now  and its a genuine pleasure to have stumbled upon such an awesome community.

Samszee

You mean you haven't ragequit anyway?

I certainly have.  Can't stay away though.

Welcome.

The community gets better every time someone passionate about the game joins the forums.

Happy flying!

Edited July 21, 2016 by SorryDave
